caption.p: ( a) Observed pre-vaccinations measles dynamics for London ( red circles), corrected for under-reporting, along with predictions of an autoregressive time series version of the SEIR model, starting at the observed initial density of cases and susceptibles (for more details, see [ 126]) ( b) Birth rates accompanying the dynamics in panel ( a) (Taken from Fig. 4 in above book chapter, found on p. 41)
